title: How orbits were to work
description:
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men?

Michael’s Men of Action is a one-on-one Master’s program that teaches men how to create elite social lives by becoming higher status.

Click this link to learn how you can have a High-Status lifestyle now:
https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast

Click here to join the Men of Action community and watch the High-Status Networking 101 course:
https://m.moamentoring.com/moa-community

transcription: {"text": "The idea that Isaac Newton came up with the idea for how orbits were to work, when obviously he knew somewhat because his calculations for gravity came from Johannes Kepler, but the idea that he understood, hey, if I have an object and I go far enough, it's going to go in an orbit and come back, and that also we use some of the calculations in there. For instance, when we build Resorts World, the casino over here, we aren't using relativistic formulas or quantum mechanic formulas. We are using Newtonian physics in order to determine how much structural strength we need in order to build a building that's 800 feet tall, right? We're using Newtonian physics. So the idea that he got so much of this correct, not understanding things like absolute zero or deep space or the fact that the atmosphere is 60 miles high, any of these things, not understanding what gravitons are, not understanding electromagnetism, not understanding the strong nuclear force or the weak nuclear force, not having any idea of any of that, for him to get so much correct in the 16th century, to me, is one of the most fascinating things.
